price: ߊ߬ ߕߘߍ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߡߍ߲߫ ߊ߬ ߞߣߐ߫ ߝߏ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߛߌ߰ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊߥߟߌ߬ ߟߏ߲ ߠߊ߫
arabic: لَلَبِثَ فِي بَطۡنِهِۦٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: lalabitha fī baṭnihi ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
